entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, 1.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Wawa Airport 08:00 AM EST Thursday 29 December 2022
Condition: Mostly Cloudy
Temperature: 1.9°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.6 kPa falling
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 93 %
Dewpoint: 0.9°C
Wind: S 11 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of drizzle. Temperature steady near plus 4. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of drizzle. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature steady near plus 4. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 07:36 AM EST Thursday 29 December 2022

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of rain or drizzle. Low plus 4.
entry.summary: Periods of rain mixed with drizzle. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light after midnight. Wind becoming south 20 gusting to 40 before morning. Low plus 4. Forecast issued 07:36 AM EST Thursday 29 December 2022

entry.title: Friday: Periods of rain or drizzle. Temperature falling to minus 1 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Periods of rain ending early in the afternoon then cloudy with 30 percent chance of drizzle. Wind south 20 km/h becoming west 20 near noon. Temperature falling to minus 1 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 07:36 AM EST Thursday 29 December 2022
